summary: Recoloring of Male and Female fine clothes01. Females use Tiwa44's UNP mini dresses.
descriptionHtml:
Wild Thane

Using the UNP Mini Dress Collection by Tiwa44 www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376

Colors used for each set:

Black, Blue, Brown, Copper, Gold, Green, Pink, Purple, Red, Teal, White, Yellow

*Note* All Female clothes are 2048x2048 (Some shoes/hats/accessories/gloves are of smaller sizes). Male clothes are 1024x1024 (I used the wedding outfit due to it being cleaner and less spots than the normal fine clothes)

Contains the following

12 Female and 12 male fineclothes01 outfits
2 sets of boots (black and brown)
12 Female and 12 male finehat02's

Level lists have been created to randomize outfits for NPCs that wear fineclothes01.
Outfits have a 50% chance of having any of the standard or magical necklaces, rings and a 25% chance of a circlet (no uniqe jewelry).
Also the NPCs will have a 50% chance of having one of the finehats02.
You should be able to find the fine clothes at vendors that sell clothing or as random items.

All textures are recolored default fineclothes01, fineboots01 and finehat02. I made sure that the female textures will also work with the full length fineclothes01 but I did not outfits containing those at this time.
Meshes are the creation of Tiwa44 referenced at the top.

If you can't wait to find all the outfits. You can find them in qasmoke near the table with all the ladles.

:!!Disclaimer!!:

The meshes (Accept for some of the ground/world version meshes): I have no idea how they will work on your system. I do not build/modify meshes so I cannot fix/convert/rebuild the meshes. If the meshes clip, look wrong or anything else, there is nothing I can do, you will have to contact the original mesh designer (Tiwa44 www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376) and see if he/she can/will fix it for you.

Feel free to use these meshes/textures however you want. Just be sure to give credit.

** Note **, it's called Wild Thane because half of the NPC Thanes use fineclothes01 and by half I mean 2 of them (Dengeir of Stuhn and Erikur of Solitude. I setup Bryling to use fineclothes01 and then there's Hrongar of Whiterun.... I tried to get him to put them on but he responded with "I'm not wearing those namby, pamby, girly man clothes!!" as he was drawing his great sword so I let him be.
author: Kryliss
